markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Envenom Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3991) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 50</row>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Prerequisites**
you possess a Strike from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat that deals poison damage

</column>

---

You spit venom onto a weapon you're holding or a weapon held by a willing creature within 30 feet; you can also use this ability to envenom your nagaji fangs unarmed attack. If the next Strike with the chosen weapon before the start of your next turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 2d6 poison damage.
name: Envenom Strike
prerequisite: you possess a Strike from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat that deals poison damage
prerequisite_markdown: you possess a Strike from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat that deals poison damage
